entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
